ing: 1 head romaine lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces
des: "This light and refreshing salad has been requested by my family for years! The sweetness from the fruit combined with the zesty dressing and crunchy lettuce makes this salad a beautiful beginning to any meal."
ins:
Whisk oil, lemon juice, mustard, sugar, salt, white pepper, and black pepper together in a bowl until smooth.
Toss lettuce, onion, blueberries, almonds, mandarin oranges, and strawberries together in a large bowl. Drizzle dressing over salad and toss to coat.
